name: Light And Dark (Rud156)
description:
A simple platformer where you try to survive the levels. All levels are randomly generated and you have to them cross till you die. 

CONTROLS:

ARROW KEYS, SPACE AND ENTER(RETURN)

I know the UI needs a lot of work but it'll be fixed.

This is my first Unity submission and feedback is highly appreciated.

The source is available at: Light And Dark
